description:
We are a personal injury law office in San Antonio, Texas. At Khattar Law, PC, we put our clients first. We take on insurance companies and other responsible parties for you so that you can focus on recovering from your injuries or grieving a loss.

Our main practice areas

Personal injury is a wide field. While clients commonly associate it with car crashes, our law office handles other types of cases, too:

• Social Security: Whether you intend to pursue Social Security Disability or Social Security Retirement & Survivors Benefits, we are happy to assist you.
• Truck Accidents: Going up against commercial trucking companies and their insurance companies is a lot tougher than passenger vehicle drivers. We can help.
• Dog Bite Injury: Whether you or your loved one suffered injuries, we are eager to pursue compensation for your injuries.
• Personal Injury: More general personal injury cases we handle include medical injuries, birth injuries and car crashes.
• Additional Cases: Outside of personal injury law, we also represent employees in cases related to wage and hour laws or wrongful termination.

Why our clients love Khattar Law, PC

Our law office hires a large team of attorneys and administrative staff so that we always have the resources on hand to take on your case. You never need to worry about us cutting corners in your case or providing subpar services to save time.
